price: 2. Diggah nanu ama Qhuraan Qarab afat kaa oobisne kaak maqna taaxigeeniih kas elle geytaanankeh.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
